thread.section_title: Tyresales Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Tyresales | tyresales.com.au
thread.title: Michael Wulff

author: Michael Wulff
title: Michael Wulff
text:
Can't even begin to tell you how simple and easy using your site was.
Had my tyres fitted to my Hyundai Santa Fe fitted whilst it was being serviced at my regular service centre.
I looked at the Tyre reviews for my vehicle and made what I believe and good choice and saved more than $250 from my last set.
Love the fact in that, I didn't have to listen to a pushy salesperson and wait around for them to be fitted.
Great choice and great service. Thanks
